task_description:
# Add form validation to Equipment creation

**Linear Issue:** [BUI-9](https://linear.app/builder-project/issue/BUI-9/add-form-validation-to-equipment-creation)
**Priority:** High
**Status:** Backlog


## Description

**Bug Description:**
The Equipment creation form lacks proper validation.

**Location:** frontend/src/pages/EquipmentPage.tsx

**Issues:**

* No validation for equipment name (required)
* Serial number format not validated
* No error feedback to user

**Expected Behavior:**

* Validate required fields before submission
* Show inline validation errors
* Disable submit until form is valid

**Priority:** Medium

patterns.validation_helper_pattern: Follow validateCode function (lines 48-55): return null for empty values, trim whitespace, use regex for format validation, return clear error message
patterns.form_integration_pattern: Chain validation helpers with || operator in validateEquipmentForm (lines 101-111)
patterns.ui_error_display_pattern: Follow equipment name field (lines 343-353): error={!!errors.field}, helperText shows error OR character count

existing_implementations.description: Validation infrastructure exists with validateCode, validatePhone, validateEmail helpers. Equipment form already has validation for name and notes fields.

validation_requirements.error_message: Serial Number must contain only letters, numbers, hyphens, and underscores
